rules_text:
Double strike
Whenever you cast a spell or when a permanent enters from exile from exile create a [i]Void[/i] Rift [i](A void rift is a colorless token enchantment called “Void[/i] Rift”)
Whenever Skirk, Void Star attack it get +1/+1 for each void rift you control.
If you control 4 or more void rifts, sacrifice all void rifts you control then exile target creature.
